main event: On June 29, 1956, a sighting of an unidentified flying object was reported in Portland, Oregon.
interesting points: The object appeared to be heading towards an airport, possibly resembling an aircraft., The observer described the object as smaller than a pencil eraser at arm's length and bright in color., The sighting lasted approximately one minute., Another report mentions seeing two bright lights in the sky circling each other., The object was reported to be moving very fast, around 1000 miles per hour.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object, possibly an aircraft or balloon
witness description: the observer was driving home from work
